newsitem.title: USA: WasteMasters Inc arranges new financing.
newsitem.headline: WasteMasters Inc arranges new financing.

text.p: WasteMasters Inc said Friday that it received $300,000 in capital from the proceeds of a private placement of its common stock.
The company said the funds will be used to meet its immediate working capital requirements.
WasteMAsters also said it retained Star Funding Inc to obtain $6 million of long-term debt financing.
The proceeds from the debt financing, said the company, will be used to develop the company's existing landfills, acquire other waste processing sites and for working capital.

In a separate transaction, the company said it terminated the memorandum of understanding with Strategica Capital Corp to provide a $4 million line of credit to the company, saying terms of the financing was not in the best long-term interests of its shareholders.
